name: Go corona
description:
Hello nikhil sir,

Due to this epidemic of corona virus is going on in this world ,the whole world is under the biggest threat. It is killing a large number of people with exponential rise in number day by day.

precaution to which our president have announced a 21 day quarantine.

We ourselves will "RESCUE"  from this epidemic by individual efforts of staying at homes and social distancing

So my game, Go Corona,basically focused on infotainment for the people in this quarantine.it consists of 2 sub games -

1.goCorona coronaGo -a 2d shooter  ,aim to shoot the virus and maintain the arrow streak to get combo

2.Corona Handshake- (Social Distancing) Player have to avoid all the handshake and keep sanitising his/her hands ,time to time to score high. It will create awareness for especially children playing this game 

This game was developed on p5js (a library of javascript).it was my first game developed and i learnt many things. Just started this ,so quality is low(learning).

(PS. The whole game was developed from scratch on mobile only)

Thank you very much sir✌️it helped a lot in exploring me

Assests-

Google.com
